name: The Planet of The Arthropods
description:
A first-person shooter video game created for a course.

Use WSAD to move, and space to jump. You can double jump. Left-click to shoot at enemies, and scroll to change weapons. 

Note: The browser version doesn't have any sound and it gets very laggy, it's more advised to play the windows version.

Modifications For Class:

- Unique Lengthy First Level

- Parkour

- Different Music

- Extra Easter Egg In Main Menu ;)
